content: perfect for styling over your favourite swimwear this crochet dress adds coverage and flair to any pool or lake summer outfit this pullover beach cover up has a classy look with the high neckline tank straps and long length but also offers a touch sexy with the peekaboo mesh body and optional side slits it s easy to work up using simple stitches and can be made in 5 different sizes from xxs to 5xl please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on www lakesideloops com in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern pictures chart video tutorial** left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
